name: Fly Your Plane By Bashing Q and P While Listening To Chill Music I Found Online
name_original: Fly Your Plane By Bashing Q and P While Listening To Chill Music I Found Online
description:
My first ever submission for game jam!

Like the title said, you make the plane fly by tapping 'q' and 'p' in your keyboard vigorously.

Still need title screen and game over background, but i really didn't have a big inspiration for the design. And the title is way too long.

Music from the Free Music Archive:

Just Can't Burn, Don't Feel So Low, Breakdown by Mid-Air Machine is lisenced under CC BY-SA

Where From by Mid-Air Machine and Goodbye, Grandmother by J.Syreus Bach is liscenced under CC BY-NC-SA
